moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.name: Ember

moves.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.
moves.name: Facade

moves.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 1.
moves.name: Confide

moves.desc: Raises the Attack of the user and all allies 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 2.
moves.name: Howl

ability.name: Magician
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon icrease Sp. Attack each turn.

moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held : stat if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's stat is being ignored. stats lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's : stat.
moves.name: Bug Bite

moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
moves.name: Electroweb

moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to poison the target.
moves.name: Poison Sting

moves.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the foe(s) Speed by 2.
moves.name: String Shot

moves.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.
moves.name: Disarming Voice

moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
moves.shortDesc: Wow in sunlight.
moves.name: Solar Beam

moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.name: Magical Leaf

moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have major status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.
moves.name: Safeguard

ability.name: Magic Guard
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by direct attacks.

moves.desc: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
moves.shortDesc: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.
moves.name: Present

moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.
moves.name: Endeavor

moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.
moves.name: Protect

moves.desc: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.
moves.shortDesc: Paralyzes the target.
moves.name: Thunder Wave

ability.name: Serene Grace
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

moves.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
moves.shortDesc: More power
moves.name: Grass Knot

moves.desc: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost to attacks during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer active, the user attacks a random opposing Pokemon instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not check accuracy and does not ignore type immunity.
moves.shortDesc: Waits 2 turns; deals double the damage taken.
moves.name: Bide

moves.desc: Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a major status condition in the user's party. The power of each hit is equal to 5+(X/10), where X is each participating Pokemon's base Attack; each hit is considered to come from the user.
moves.shortDesc: Usa el poder de tu amigo mas fuerte para atacar.
moves.name: Beat Up

moves.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.
moves.name: Endure

ability.name: Chlorophyll
ability.shortDesc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

moves.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn.
moves.shortDesc: If hit by physical attack, returns double damage.
moves.name: Counter

moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.
moves.name: Tackle

moves.desc: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if last
moves.name: Pursuit

moves.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the user's attacks will be critical hits.
moves.shortDesc: Until the end of the next turn, user's moves crit.
moves.name: Laser Focus

ability.name: Steadfast
ability.shortDesc: If this Pokemon flinches, its Speed is raised by 1 stage.

moves.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
moves.shortDesc: Max power
moves.name: Return

moves.desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
moves.shortDesc: Power increases when used on consecutive turns.
moves.name: Echoed Voice

moves.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
moves.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.
moves.name: Follow Me

moves.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: 50% move power is 3x next turn.
moves.name: Helping Hand

ability.name: Keen Eye
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon's accuracy can't be lowered by others; ignores their evasiveness stat.
